(XRD) patterns of the samples were identiﬁed using a Bruker

were characterized using a ﬁeld-emission scanning electron
microscope (FE-SEM; TESCAN MAIA3). The PL and PLE
spectra, as well as the decay curves, of the as-obtained
phosphors were plotted using an Edinburgh FS5 spectrometer
equipped with a 150 Wcontinued-wavelength xenon lamp and
a pulsed xenon lamp, respectively. The IQE values of the
samples were measured using an Edinburgh FS5
